attributes.additional_details:
Dear Sir / Madam,

I saw an advertisement on expat.com, regarding an recuritement of worker to UK,from a person, named as Mr. HELEN NICOLAS and also i would like to enclose his addresses and contact number. And he asked me to contact the Agent as tratfordtravel.co.uk@live.com.

Therefore, please confim, whether this agency is genuiene and this person really need a worker. I will copy and paste the terms and conditions as below, what they have sent to us on 13/10/2011.
Please enquiry and confirm as above mentioned subject and please reply to me.
Thank you for your cooperation.

Thank you

Sincerely
 helen clare pascal paul

My contact no. is +973-33507890/36517927

The person's contact details;

401 Bury Street West, Lower Edmonton, London, N9 9JR
tel, no. +447045794284
